medical_history.chief_complaint: Difficulty and painful swallowing (odynophagia) for one year.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The dysphagia had a gradual onset and was progressive, initially starting with difficulty swallowing solids, which then developed into difficulty swallowing both solids and liquids. The patient experienced feelings of food and drinks 'being stuck in her throat'. She also reported easy fatiguability and unintentional weight loss.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Chronic iron-deficiency anemia of several years.
medical_history.family_history: Family history of G6PD deficiency reported in siblings; no family history of gastrointestinal malignancy or autoimmune disorders.
